+        // C6H10O8 + 8H = C6H10O4 + 4H2O
+        CHEMICAL_PLANT_RECIPES.recipeBuilder().duration(260).EUt(120000)

+        // C3H6O + CH4 = C4H10O
+        CHEMICAL_RECIPES.recipeBuilder().duration(250).EUt(230000)
